about_the_game:
Studying is fun. [/]
Games to review Mathematics, English and Language for children from 6 to 12 years old.

Little Smart Planet is an application with more than 50 educational games for your children to learn in a fun way and reinforce the school's subjects. With our elementary games, studying is something else!

Let your children learn! Our games will love them and for that reason, they will review their school content and improve.
FUN AND LEARNING

Features



Educational:
Test your knowledge and review the school content by playing!



Multi Language: [/]
Available in Spanish, English and Portuguese

About the game:
  • Learn while having fun
  • 3 levels of difficulty: easy, normal and difficult
  • Mathematics educational games
  • Educational language games
  • English educational games

Games to learn! Little Smart Planet is a gamification tool developed by pedagogues that takes into account the evolution of each available child of 3 levels of difficulty: easy, medium and difficult.

The games have aids or "chops" to overcome the challenges. As your children advance in the game, the difficulty increases until you reach a 5th secret level even more fun. Playing is the challenge!

But that's not all, besides the games include a reward system based on medals and trophies, getting the little ones more motivation and interest in learning.

It is an ideal resource for parents and children! While they enjoy a school repair game that also encourages their safety and autonomy, you are calm knowing that they are taking advantage of time and learning in a fun way.

Buy it now! Choose the most appropriate activity and play. Studying, it's fun!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.5 or later
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

name: Little Smart Planet

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 240 GT or Radeon HD 6570 – 1024 MB (1 GB)
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
